          <title>
            <string language="en">Radioactive decay of nuclear wastes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioaktiver Zerfall der Atommülle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaiblissement radioactif des pertes

          <description>
            <string language="en">The graph shows the radioactive decay of nuclear wastes over time.</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra el decaimiento radiactivo de
